sections.heading: 1210.508A through 1210.508H of this title shall be known and may be cited as the “Strong Readers Act”
sections.text: Added by Laws 1997, c. 349, § 1, eff. July 1, 1997. Amended by Laws 1999, c. 176, § 1, eff. July 1, 1999; Laws 2005, c. 385, § 1; Laws 2024, c. 411, § 3, eff. July 1, 2024.
